children.comment: Ah, I wondered.
Yes, and a Cowboy Bebop reference too.
Is that username a Trigun reference? http://i.imgur.com/dlFFQfC.gif
I remember him saying in an interview that he prefers to do movies that families can watch together. He's also a huge physical comedy fan.
IIRC, he's said he doesn't like straight violence.  He wants it to look pretty and be funny.
I wish he would do a couple pure action films more Jet Li style, stuff with no comedy.
Chinese Zodiac was his last big action movie. He only (understandably) wants to do "normal" roles now.
